knimeNode.name: PMML Ensemble Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Collects PMML from a loop and outputs a pmml ensemble.

fullDescription.intro: This node collects PMML models that are generated in a loop and puts them together in one ensemble PMML Mining Model. This model consists of a segmentation with one segment for each model.
fullDescription.option: Determines how the results of the models in the ensemble are combined

ports.inPort: PMML model to be included in the ensemble
